text: Chisimu chene timwasimane ŵandu ŵali ŵakupundanganya nnope utinda kwa ŵandu ŵaakulupilile; ni Ayuda kwisa soni ŵakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), soni chisimu chene timwasimane ŵali ŵakuŵandichila ŵao nnope ku chinonyelo chakwanonyela ŵandu ŵakulupilila; ni aŵala ŵakutiji: “Chisimu uwwe ni Akilisito.” Yalakweyo ligongo lyanti mwa ŵanganyao mwana achalijiganye ya dini kwisa soni ŵakun’jogopa Nnungu, soni nikuti ŵanganyao ŵangalikwesya
